param.label: Processors requested
param.name: requests_cpu
param.help: Number of processing cores required to allocate the job. If no machines in the cluster have at least this amount of processors available, the job won't be run and be delayed until one machine has enough cores available. Should be smaller or equal than Processors limit. Leave blank to use default value. Above 1, should be always a rounded integer, for fractions of a processor below one, use floating number

param.label: Processors limit
param.name: limits_cpu
param.help: Maximum number of processing cores that can be used for the job. If the tool goes beyond that limit, then it might be stopped. Leave blank to use default value. Above 1, should be always a rounded integer, for fractions of a processor below one, use floating number

param.label: Memory requested
param.name: requests_memory
param.help: Memory size in gigabytes, 'pmem' value (1-256). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Memory limit
param.name: limits_memory
param.help: Memory size in gigabytes, 'pmem' value (1-256). Leave blank to use default value.
